news.title: Real Estate Prices Soar in Dar es Salaam
news.content: Experts say the rise in property prices is due to increased demand and limited urban space.

news.title: Zanzibar Becomes Hotspot for Luxury Villas
news.content: Tourism and foreign investments are driving a boom in beachfront property developments.

news.title: Real Estate Sector Gets Tax Incentives
news.content: The Ministry of Finance announced new tax cuts for developers building affordable housing units.

news.title: Kigamboni Bridge Boosts Property Development
news.content: New access routes have sparked construction booms along the Kigamboni coastline.

news.title: Eco-Friendly Homes Gaining Popularity in Tanzania
news.content: Green building technologies and sustainable design are attracting buyers focused on the environment.
